<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103822</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103822</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206641</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Adeline Hornbek and the Homestead Act: A Colorado Success Story</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Adeline Hornbek und die Gehöft-Tat: Eine 
Kolorado Erfolg-Geschichte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Adeline Hornbek et la Loi de ferme : Une 
Histoire de Succès du Colorado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Adeline Hornbek e o ato do homestead: Uma 
História Do Sucesso De Colorado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Adeline Hornbek e la Legge della fattoria: 
Una Storia Di Successo Del Colorado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Αδεληνε Hornbek και ο νόμος αγροτικών σπιτιών: 
Μια επιτυχημένη περίπτωση του Κολοράντο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Adeline Hornbek y el acto de la granja: Una 
Historia Del Éxito De Colorado</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site explores how Adeline Hornbek, single mother of four, defied traditional gender roles to become the owner of a successful ranch under the Homestead Act.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Site erforscht wie Adeline Hornbek, die 
einzelne Mutter von vier und fordert traditionelle Geschlechtrollen 
heraus, um dem Inhaber einer erfolgreichen Ranch unter der Gehöft-Tat
zu stehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site explore comment Adeline Hornbek, mère 
simple de quatre, défiant des rôles traditionnels de genre pour 
aller bien au propriétaire d'un ranch réussi sous la Loi de ferme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local explora como Adeline Hornbek, única 
matriz de quatro, defied papéis tradicionais do gender para assentar 
bem no proprietário de um rancho bem sucedido sob o ato do homestead.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo esplora come Adeline Hornbek, una 
singola madre di quattro, ruoli tradizionali sfidati a di 
genere per stare bene al proprietario di un ranch riuscito a norma 
della legge della fattoria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή εξερευνά πώς η Adeline Hornbek, 
ανύπαντρη μητέρα τεσσάρων, προκάλεσε τους παραδοσιακούς ρόλους 
γένους για να γίνει ο ιδιοκτήτης ενός επιτυχούς αγροκτήματος στο
πλαίσιο του νόμου αγροτικών σπιτιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio explora cómo Adeline Hornbek, sola 
madre de cuatro, desafiando papeles tradicionales del género para 
sentir bien al propietario de un rancho acertado bajo acto de la 
granja.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206641</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103822</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/adeline-hornbek-and-the-homestead-act-a-colorado-success-story</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
